src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : Do you need information ? [MASK] [end] RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( hot ( chocolate ) ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . # inform ( food ) ; inform ( drink ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , that 's good , we 'll go there . We have time before the appointment . # acknowledge ( )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( rheumatology_ward ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( rheumatology_ward ) ) RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . # affirm ( ) ; request ( help ) LC : Mhm . # acknowledge ( ) [start] RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . RP : I 'd like to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : What time was our appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : So we have an appointment at 10.30 PM . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : It 's 10 PM just now so we have plenty of time . LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : We have time . LC : We 'll walk slowly . RP : We 'll walk slowly . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : There 's no need to worry . RP : Ok , there you go , we 're in the ward . We need to ask where the reception for this ward is . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Well that 's it , we 've arrived . LC : Ok . Very good . [MASK] RP : Do you want to ask him ? [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : Um ... Where is the reception for the rheumatology ward ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ah ... [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , thank you . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) @ CG ( LC+RP , go-to ( reception ) ) RP : So we 'll take a ticket . LC : Mhm ... # affirm ( ) RP : And then we 'll wait until we 're called . LC : Ok. Is there 's a waiting room ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( location ( waiting_room ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( waiting_room ) ) RP : Yes , there 's a waiting room just there . We can sit down . # affirm ( ) ; suggest ( sitting-down ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( waiting_room ) ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) @ CG ( LC , go-to ( waiting_room ) ) RP : So you do n't get tired . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . [MASK] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Are there set opening hours ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) RC : Ah , it opens at 11 o'clock ? # r-confirm ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : And what time does it close ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( closing_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( cafe ( opening_times ( closing_time ) ) ) RC : Ah , that 's a shame , thank you . # give-feedback ( negative ) LP : Is there ... # incomplete-da ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Is there a lift to get to the cafeteria ? # request ( location ( lift ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : Um no , because it 's on the ground floor . # disaffirm ( ) LP : Oh ok. # acknowledge ( ) RC : But could you please tell us where the lifts are ? Where at the entrance are they located ? # request ( location ( lifts ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lifts ) ) RC : Um for the lifts ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . Have a nice day . # bye ( )

[MASK] RP : I 'm hard of hearing and the sound is a little low , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : So , another question ... [end] LC : Um , hello . src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : I 'm hungry . # request ( food ) @ G ( LC , eat ( ) ) [start] LC : I 'm hungry . [MASK] [MASK] RP : I 'm hungry . [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'd like to eat . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : It 's the most important question of the day . Are you hungry yet ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Yes . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You can ask my colleague in the room who is responsible for the meals . [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'd like to go to the toilet before the consultation . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) )
